item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>didn't realize you were passing through... not that I was in town, but I could have passed along some suggested spots. Looks like you got some of the top attractions in.</p>
item.content:encoded: didn’t realize you were passing through… not that I was in town, but I could have passed along some suggested spots. Looks like you got some of the top attractions in.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>A good question. I'm not a Ferris officionado like yourself but it could well be. If not then I'm going to the MOMA today so that might be it as well. Bueller... Bueller... Bueller etc etc</p>
item.content:encoded: A good question. I’m not a Ferris officionado like yourself but it could well be. If not then I’m going to the MOMA today so that might be it as well. Bueller… Bueller… Bueller etc etc

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>...is that the art gallery where Ferris Bueller goes with Cameron...?</p>
item.content:encoded: …is that the art gallery where Ferris Bueller goes with Cameron…?
